name: Fimbul Winter VR
description:
FimbulWinter VR is a first-person horror game in a scandinavian style. The game revolves around a hermit who just try to survive. But the last winter has begun and he needs to survive in this open-world full of dangers that is a unique combination of first person shooter, survival horror, tower defense, and role-playing games.

Game Features:
- A big map with a variety of beautiful landscapes and landmarks based on real-life locations.
- VR experience
- Open-world map
